zh.DeviceHome.index.926510-2: 不同的设备因为通信协议的不同，存在接入步骤的差异
zh.DeviceHome.index.926510-6: 产品是设备的集合，通常指一组具有相同功能的设备。物联设备必须通过产品进行接入方式配置。
zh.DeviceHome.index.926510-8: 通过产品对同一类型的设备进行统一的接入方式配置。请参照设备铭牌说明选择匹配的接入方式。
zh.DeviceHome.index.926510-10: 添加单个设备，用于验证产品模型是否配置正确。
zh.DeviceHome.index.926510-12: 对添加的测试设备进行功能调试，验证能否连接到平台，设备功能是否配置正确。
zh.DeviceHome.index.926510-14: 批量添加同一产品下的设备

en.DeviceHome.index.926510-2: Different devices may have different access steps due to differences in communication protocols
en.DeviceHome.index.926510-6: A product is a collection of devices, usually referring to a group of devices with the same functionality. IoT devices must be configured through product access methods.
en.DeviceHome.index.926510-8: Configure unified access methods for devices of the same type through products. Please refer to the instructions on the device nameplate to select the matching access method.
en.DeviceHome.index.926510-10: Add a single device to verify if the product model is configured correctly.
en.DeviceHome.index.926510-12: Perform functional debugging on the added testing equipment to verify if it can connect to the platform and if the device's functions are configured correctly.
en.DeviceHome.index.926510-14: Batch adding devices under the same product
